backend/main.mo: Defines product, category, cart, order, and user profile types plus state and admin/user operations for an ecommerce backend.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting the favicon and title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling routing, layout, theming, and demo data initialization.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Checks authentication and admin status before rendering admin‑only content.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for listing and creating categories with a modal form and category grid.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog form for creating a new product, handling validation, mutation, and form state.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsAd: Admin view listing all products with loading states and an option to open the product editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Component that blocks access until the user is authenticated, showing a sign‑in card if not.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying store branding and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, cart badge, and login/logout controls based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryFil: Displays selectable product categories with counts, loading state, and selection handlers.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Product card showing pricing, deal indicators, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, covering products, categories, user profiles, orders, and admin actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.tsx: Implements a simple hash‑based router hook that parses path and query params and provides navigation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with an earthy color palette.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting prices from paise into rupee strings, including short formats for large values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing products and categories, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, price totals, and navigation to checkout or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Provides a checkout form, validates input, submits orders via mutation, and redirects to confirmation on success.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmation message after an order is placed and provides navigation buttons to orders or shop.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows the user's orders with auth protection, displaying a placeholder message when no orders exist.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays product details with pricing, stock status, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Renders the shop homepage with search, category filtering, and a product grid with loading states.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items, quantities, variants, and totals with persistence.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, container settings, animations, and theme utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including ecommerce goals, required images, completed features, and pending feature requests for the kirana store site.
